reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel, great staff, i'll recommend it to all my friends and Planigo's clients.
reviews.title: Best week-end ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Keppler Hotel is a unique boutique Hotel i discovered in searching Tripadvisor and am happy to advise almost all which has been said about the Hotel is correct.
reviews.title: Something different in Paris
